topics.body:
I just remembered something during my inactivity.

It was lunchtime and so I was eating some rice with grilled fish (sad, I know) and then I thought that I missed something. I needed something swet to make it taste better so I asked my dad to take out the bottle of soy sauce and pour some on my rice. He did so and everyone else wanted some so he poured it an a bowl as I was eating my soy sauce rice. As the soy sauce slowly drips away from the bottle, a figure emerged in a bottle.

It was a dead gecko, all black and probably drowned in the soy sauce.

Everyone went quiet and I picked up my plate, went to the sink, placed my plate with the unfinished food and ran into my bathroom, trying to vomit.

Yeah, now I don't eat soy sauce any more.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976
